result.execSummary:
The defendant Lee T Dicristo was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
All Financial obligations shall be paid to the Clerk of Courts..
Shall pay fine + costs + $15 pymt plan fee at rate of $50/month comm 2/15/16 and 15th of each month until paid.
Failure to Pay = 10 days DCJ w/h&t

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with victim.   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

ADDRESS INFO for Lee T Dicristo
Current: 437 E Monroe Ave, Hartford, WI 53027 United States  (Effective: 01-19-2016)
Prior: 502 Hillside Ter 3, Neosho, WI 53059

Defendant, Lee T Dicristo in court, Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Both parties sign plea agreement.  Mr. Dicristo will pay $10 in restitution today.  Court reviews charge/Penalty with DE.  Court finds victim rights compliance.  Court reviews right to attorney with defendant.  Court accepts waiver of attorney, decision made FVKI.  DE pleads NC to count 1.  Court reviews PQWOR with Defendant, Mr. DiCristo states he was paying attention when rights reviewed with 15CT508, does not want to review again.  Court finds factual basis.  Court finds plea made FVKI, accepts plea and finds guilty of count 1.  Atty. Thompson heard on recommendation.  Mr. Dicristo does not make statement.  Court heard and sentence imposed:

Mr. Dicristo will pay $10 in restitution today.  
Fine of $100 fine plus costs=$579.  Payment plan of $50 per month established by Court starting Feb. 15, 2016.  10 days DCJ in the alternative.  
DNA Sample to be provided.

9:23 - Defendant, Lee T Dicristo in court, Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court finds probable cause. P&S set. Address update: 437 E Monroe Ave, Hartford 53027. Court sets $500 PA bond with conditions:   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.   Defendant shall not have any direct or indirect contact or communication with SD.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 19, 2016 at 11:15 am.
